lead_paragraph: SCOPPETTA--Nicholas. The trustees and staff of The Children's Aid Society mourn the passing of Nicholas Scoppetta, a fierce advocate for New York City and its children who faced towering challenges. He spent 18 years on the Children's Aid board, ultimately as president and then chairman, before becoming commissioner of the Administration for Children's Services in 1996 and later the commissioner of the New York City Fire Department. Our hearts go out to his wife, Susan; daughter, Andrea; son, Eric; and the rest of his family. Phoebe C. Boyer, President and CEO; Iris Abrons, Board Chair 1/3
